content: above to parallel with the previous one join the two together © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 9 grace 3tr in the next 2ch space on in the next 2ch space 3dtr continue working around the starburst and slip_stitch 2ch 3dtr to form a corner the starburst until you have between clusters above there is no need for the completed 3 sides ending repeat in the next space corner to join the previous with a 2ch exactly as you one these will be joined did with the first starburst later now join remaining 5 you will have a strip of 7 now we are going to whizz starbursts of first row as starbursts all joined down the long side turn the before ending with a 3dtr together on three sides corner with 3dtr in the same and 2ch space then **3tr in the next two spaces in the next space 3dtr 2ch repeat from ** all the way now take the starburst from then ignoring the joining down the strip until you get the bottom of the next row chains below 3dtr in the to the last corner end with on the chart and join with next space the chains don t a 3dtr and 2ch 3dtr as you did previously need to join as this will happen when we join the next row of starbursts © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 10 grace now turn the starburst 3tr in the next 2ch space now join the corners through 180 degrees so the on the starburst and slip_stitch together insert your hook 3dtr you just made sits between clusters above from top to bottom down parallel with the previous repeat 3tr in next space through the space between one and slip_stitch to join as now 3dtr in next space squares in the previous row before and under the 2ch below it make a slip_stitch to join 1ch to complete the join complete the next side on current motif then join the next starburst and continue as previously you are going to join the make the first slip_stitch in the chain make the second slip_stitch in the final corner with two slip_stitch space between 3dtr in the chain space between 3dtr of adjacent square the square diagonally opposite this makes a neat corner © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 11 grace now carry on with 3dtr and repeat the steps above on the final long side proceed as previously you until you have 7 row of 7 instead of 2ch and ignoring now know how to join all starbursts stop when you the 2ch below you can join corners get to the final long side as these together by 1ch slip_stitch this is slightly different into
